author: Peter Loftus
title: Moderna Gets U.S. Funding for Development, Manufacturing of Experimental Coronavirus Vaccine - The Wall Street Journal
description: Moderna Gets U.S. Funding for Development, Manufacturing of Experimental Coronavirus Vaccine The Wall Street Journal What Is the Earliest We Could See a Coronavirus Vaccine? extratv University of Oxford coronavirus vaccine trial aims to have 500 people in tes…
content:
Moderna Inc. said Thursday it reached an agreement to receive as much as $483 million in funding from a federal agency to accelerate the development and production of its closely watched experimental vaccine against the new coronavirus.
